HEADER.content: <hmonth> <hdate> <htime> { Cleared or Expired Alarm: ClearOrExpiredTime= | Time= } <hdatetime>,Category=<msgIdPart1> <msgIdPart2>,CriticalityLevel=<hlevel>, <!payload:msgIdPart1>
